summary: The BuildRequest contains constraints about keeping News in demo mode and ensuring no frontend API key handling, but the only change is to `project_state.json`, adding/updating a project summary and feature list describing a mobile app UI, News regions content, and even "GNews-backed" refresh behavior. No concrete implementation evidence is present, but the modified state file introduces multiple unrequested features and requirements metadata not present in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Mobile app UI scope ("Pass English Speaking" home screen with 4 main buttons) added to project summary/state.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is about confirming demo mode and API key security posture; it does not request implementing or defining a mobile app home screen UI.

hallucinated_features.description: News demo screen specification with 4 regions (Israel, Dubai, India, West Bengal) and 10 sample items per region recorded as an existing feature set.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding these UI/content requirements; it only constrains demo data to remain the default and forbids API key prompts/handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Daily auto-update/refresh semantics for news (refresh at least once every 24 hours per region) and manual refresh behavior recorded as existing features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; additionally, the BuildRequest explicitly states non-goal of enabling real external news fetching in the UI right now.

hallucinated_features.description: References to "GNews-backed regions" and preserving auto-refresh semantics for them.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest emphasizes demo/placeholder as default and avoiding real external fetching in the UI; mentioning a specific external news backend behavior is outside the stated request.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction of REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3/REQ-5/REQ-6/REQ-7 requirement IDs and associated features in project state.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists "Requirements: none"; adding requirement IDs/features is not requested.
